content.text: Match ends, Nice 2, Lokomotiv Moscow 3.
Second Half ends, Nice 2, Lokomotiv Moscow 3.
Foul by Adrien Tameze (Nice).
Anton Miranchuk (Lokomotiv Moscow) wins a free kick on the left wing.
Attempt missed. Saba Kverkvelia (Lokomotiv Moscow) right footed shot from outside the box is high and wide to the right. Assisted by Nemanja Pejcinovic.
Corner,  Lokomotiv Moscow. Conceded by Walter Benítez.
Attempt saved. Anton Miranchuk (Lokomotiv Moscow) right footed shot from the left side of the six yard box is saved in the centre of the goal. Assisted by Jefferson Farfán.
Attempt missed. Mario Balotelli (Nice) header from the centre of the box is high and wide to the left. Assisted by Allan Saint-Maximin with a cross.
Foul by Saba Kverkvelia (Lokomotiv Moscow).
Mario Balotelli (Nice) wins a free kick in the defensive half.
Corner,  Lokomotiv Moscow. Conceded by Pierre Lees-Melou.
Substitution, Nice. Nampalys Mendy replaces Wylan Cyprien.
Attempt saved. Igor Denisov (Lokomotiv Moscow) right footed shot from outside the box is saved in the bottom left corner. Assisted by Manuel Fernandes.
Attempt missed. Mario Balotelli (Nice) right footed shot from outside the box is high and wide to the right. Assisted by Wylan Cyprien.

Foul by Nemanja Pejcinovic (Lokomotiv Moscow).

Adrien Tameze (Nice) wins a free kick in the defensive half.
Corner,  Lokomotiv Moscow. Conceded by Dante.

Substitution, Lokomotiv Moscow. Éder replaces Ari.
Foul by Jean Michael Seri (Nice).
Manuel Fernandes (Lokomotiv Moscow) wins a free kick in the defensive half.
Substitution, Nice. Adrien Tameze replaces Alassane Plea.
Goal!  Nice 2, Lokomotiv Moscow 2. Manuel Fernandes (Lokomotiv Moscow) from a free kick with a right footed shot to the bottom left corner.
Racine Coly (Nice) is shown the red card.
Ari (Lokomotiv Moscow) wins a free kick in the attacking half.

Second Half begins Nice 2, Lokomotiv Moscow 1.
First Half ends, Nice 2, Lokomotiv Moscow 1.
Mario Balotelli (Nice) has gone down, but that's a dive.
Goal!  Nice 2, Lokomotiv Moscow 1. Manuel Fernandes (Lokomotiv Moscow) converts the penalty with a right footed shot to the bottom right corner.
Penalty Lokomotiv Moscow. Aleksey Miranchuk draws a foul in the penalty area.
